document.full_text: more than 450,000 households were without power on friday in the wake of thursday's strong aftershock that raised fears of new strains on japan's crippled nuclear plant.
document.title: many still without power after japan aftershock
lines_and_colors: more than 450,000 households were without power on friday in the wake of thursday's strong aftershock that raised fears of new strains on japan's crippled nuclear plant.
